synopsis.text:
Light ing the torch of second chances, "Remake Our Life!" follows the journey of 28-year-old Hashiba Kyouya, a once-passionate game developer whose dreams have crumbled alongside his bankrupt company. Forced to retreat to his childhood home, he finds himself wallowing in regret, comparing his own failures to the success of his contemporaries. As he ponders the road not taken, Kyouya stumbles upon an unexpected opportunity: he awakens to find himself ten years in the past, on the brink of his college journey.

With the wisdom of his former life still intact, Kyouya seizes this chance to enroll in the prestigious Oonaka Art Academy, a breeding ground for the creative elite. He embraces his newfound path, surrounded by an eclectic mix of future luminaries and talented roommates. Together, they embark on a rollercoaster ride of self-discovery, growth, and camaraderie.

But will Kyouya's second chance at life live up to his expectations, or will he learn that even the most carefully laid plans can lead to unforeseen consequences? Join Kyouya as he navigates the trials and tribulations of his remade life, forging new friendships and chasing his dreams in this heartwarming tale of ambition, regret, and redemption.
